def main():
    # Read input
    N = int(input())
    a = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    # Initialize min distance
    min_dist = float('inf')
    # Loop through coordinates
    for i in range(N):
        # Loop through coordinates
        for j in range(N):
            # If i and j are not the same
            if i != j:
                # Calculate distance
                dist = abs(a[i] - a[j])
                # If distance is less than current minimum
                if dist < min_dist:
                    # Set new minimum
                    min_dist = dist
    # Print minimum distance
    print(min_dist)


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
